trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents a call to either static or an instance method.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx x xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a collection of expressions that represent arguments of the called method.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the number of arguments to the expression tree node.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source: You should not use this member.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
It is only public due to assembly refactoring, and it is used internally for performance optimizations.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx$ xxx xx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The visitor to visit this node with.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the argument at index, throwing if index is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: You should not use this member.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
It is only public due to assembly refactoring, and it is used internally for performance optimizations.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx$ xxx xx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx$ xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
